name: POCO F1
tagline: Experience the perfect blend of performance and customization with our Pixel-inspired custom ROM for your device.

steps.title: Unlock Bootloader
steps.description: Ensure your device's bootloader is unlocked before proceeding.

steps.title: Reboot To Fastboot
steps.description: Reboot to Fastboot by pressing Vol Down + Power Button.

steps.title: Connection
steps.description: Open CMD or Terminal on your PC and connect your phone via USB.

steps.title: Flash Recovery
steps.description:
Flash recovery by typing:
fastboot flash recovery recovery*.img

steps.title: Reboot To Recovery
steps.description:
Reboot into Recovery typing:
fastboot reboot recovery

steps.title: Wipe Data
steps.description: In recovery, click on factory reset and then do format data.

steps.title: Flash Clover ROM
steps.description:
Select apply update using sideload & install the ROM by typing:
adb sideload CloverProject*.zip

steps.title: Reboot
steps.description: The first boot may take a few minutes. Enjoy Clover!

installationGuide.warning: Incorrect installation may brick your device. We are not responsible for any damage to your device. Proceed at your own risk.
